trans-unit.source: Enumerates types of speech synthesis events.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os tipos de eventos de síntese de fala.

trans-unit.source: Custom speech synthesis engines define the types of events submitted to the Speech platform synthesizer infrastructure with the TtsEventId.
trans-unit.target: Mecanismos de síntese de fala personalizado definem os tipos de eventos enviados para a infraestrutura da plataforma de fala sintetizador com o TtsEventId.

trans-unit.source: Specification is performed by setting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instances passed to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> member of the class implementing the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface passed to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a custom speech engine's implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: Especificação é efetuada, definindo a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>instâncias passadas para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A>membro da classe implementando a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>interface passado para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>método na implementação do mecanismo de fala personalizado <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Speech platform infrastructure indicates the type of events it is currently handling through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> passed to the speak implementation.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura da plataforma de fala indica o tipo de eventos que trata-se no momento por meio de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>passado para a implementação de fala.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> is a bitmask, where the members of TtsEventId define the location of the bit corresponding to the event type.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>é uma máscara de bits, onde os membros de TtsEventId definem o local do bit correspondente ao tipo de evento.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, WordBoundary has a value of five (5), meaning the fifth bit in the value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> indicates if the site supports the event type.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, WordBoundary tem um valor de cinco (5), que significa que o quinto bit no valor retornado por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>indica se o site oferece suporte ao tipo de evento.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes an audio level change while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma fala sintetizar mecanismo conclui uma alteração do nível de áudio enquanto fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a bookmark while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma fala sintetizar mecanismo encontra um indicador enquanto fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters the end of its input stream while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma fala sintetizar mecanismo encontra o término de seu fluxo de entrada enquanto fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a phoneme while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma fala sintetizar o mecanismo conclui um phoneme enquanto fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a sentence while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma fala sintetizar o mecanismo conclui uma frase enquanto fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine a begins speaking a stream.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma fala sintetizar mecanismo um começa falando um fluxo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a viseme while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma fala sintetizar o mecanismo conclui um viseme enquanto fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a change of Voice while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma fala sintetizar mecanismo encontra uma alteração de voz enquanto fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a word while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma fala sintetizar o mecanismo conclui uma palavra enquanto fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
